title: [GAMEPLAY] Orianna Ball Indicators (yes, there are multiple)
body:
I just got of an ARAM and by the end, I had three ball indicators (1 real one and 2 phantom). I was using the Heartseeker Oriana skin. The first appeared after I died after just managing to get an E onto an ally. The second seemed to occur when an ally died when I had just gotten an E off on them, though it was a chaotic fight so I could be wrong (I lived, unlike the first one, so definitely a different trigger).

I have screenshots if you need.

EDIT: Thanks to Kristian818 (EUW) for the videos showing this:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/2jAAEUzg-gameplay-orianna-ball-indicator-multiple-ball-indicators

replies.body:
Hey Ayame Isaki! 

Thanks for the report! This is occurring on all skins and the base. The team is aware of the issue and is investigating. ^-^

Just wanted to give you a heads up that this is still happening; confirmed trigger was death of a teammate just as the ball arrived to shield them (and it happened on ARAM; I have yet to reproduce on SR).
Thanks for the update - poking champion again!
Excellent! Thank you for the heads up!

I had the bug too. Posted it on the forums 4 days ago (no response) (http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/2jAAEUzg-gameplay-orianna-ball-indicator-multiple-ball-indicators ). Seems you are right with the "e" problem because if you look at the videos on my forum post it is exactly what I do when I get multiple markers.
Thanks for the link. I've added it to my post.

I've had this problem for a while, but I didn't post it because I know Riot won't really notice such post.

it's like when trying to charge {{item:3070}}, the damn cooldown on the item slot sometimes shows up...... sometimes it doesn't feel like it! It's completely arbitrary!

But better buff {{champion:7}} again!
This happens to me ALL the time! Almost every Orianna game I've played has created this bug. My friends told me it's been a big with her for a very long time.
